snippet.title: How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The How 2 Escape series returns in a brand-new episode: Lost Submarine!

Team up with a friend to reach a lost submarine and prevent the outbreak of war. Work together on two devices to solve increasingly challenging puzzles, where each of you has your own unique role to play. 

How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine will be available in 2025 on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PC (Steam), Xbox One (Xbox Series S|X compatible). 
Free companion app for the player 2 will be available on PC (Steam), Android and iOS. 

Wishlist How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3530680/How_2_Escape_Lost_Submarine/


#H2ELS
